problem: Different theorems use different values for ω₀
root_cause: Both are valid QCD scales, differ by O(1) factor

resolution.key_insight: Both formulations give identical predictions when g_χ absorbs the ratio

recommendation.define: ω₀ ≡ Λ_QCD ≈ 200 MeV as fundamental scale
recommendation.explain: m_π ~ 140 MeV is derived, not independent
recommendation.verify: Show both give same predictions numerically

status: RESOLVED - notation difference, not physical inconsistency
